name: Don't Touch My Mushroom
description:
Come and guard our mushrooms together! Build various vegetable and fruit tower defenses to attack invading animals and protect our mushrooms from injury.

Game features:

- Easy to operate, just by tapping with one finger.

- 6 themed scenes, show you different natural scenery

- 250 well-designed levels are waiting for you to challenge!

- 20 lovely vegetable & fruit tower defense help you attack enemy

- Upgrade tower defense can enhance their attack power

- 5 characteristic mushroom heroes for you to choose from

- Talent system accompanies the growth of heroes and makes them stronger.

- More interesting items help you pass the levels easily.
